Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /

Chapter 1 - Palette Manager Reference

This reference document describes the data types, constants, functions, and resource that are specific to the Palette Manager.

"Constants and Data Types" (page 1-3) shows the usage constants enumeration and the Palette and ColorInfo data types.

"Palette Manager Functions" (page 1-6) describes functions for initializing, manipulating, and allocating palettes; drawing with palette colors; and interacting with the Window Manager.

"The Palette Resource" (page 1-30) contains a description of the palette resource, from which palette structures can be made.
